description:
Tokugawa Hikozaemon is the Officer in charge of the Yamato`s engineering section. Chief engineer. His rank is Lieutenant Commander.
An experienced veteran of the engineering operation that supported Okita in the previous inner-planetary conflict prior to the Gamilas war. Served as chief engineer under Okita on the Kirishima, flagship of the 1st fleet, before boarding Yamato.
name: Tokugawa Hikozaemon
